title: Farm Friends
description: Do you want to meet some new friends? How about friends with wool, fur, and feathers? Come along with the Little People to Farmer Jedâ€™s farm and learn a little bit about cows, pigs, sheep, chickens, and horses. Touch and feel tabs make finding a favorite animal fun while lots of animal facts throughout make Farm Friends a rich learning experience.
author: Lori C. Froeb
